question: At the beginning of the meeting, there were 53 artists and 27 nurses. After an hour, 1/10 of the total number of people left. How many nurses are left if 33 artists stayed at the meeting?
answer:
There were a total of 53 artists + 27 nurses = <<53+27=80>>80 people who attended the meeting.
After an hour, 80 people * 1/10 = <<80*1/10=8>>8 people left the meeting.
This means 80 people - 8 people = <<80-8=72>>72 people stayed.
Out of the 72 who stayed, 72 people - 33 artists = <<72-33=39>>39 were nurses.
#### 39
